docs.snippet: Everton have signed Ireland winger Aiden McGeady on a 4-1/2 year contract from Spartak Moscow for an undisclosed fee, the Premier League club announced on Saturday....

docs.snippet: The decision to drop the charges came as the Pentagon released its annual report on sexual assault and sexual harassment at the three service academies....
docs.lead_paragraph: The decision to drop the charges came as the Pentagon released its annual report on sexual assault and sexual harassment at the three service academies.
docs.abstract: Charges in sexual assault case are dropped against Naval Academy midshipman Eric Graham after his statements about encounter were determined to be inadmissible as he had not been read his rights before questioning; decision means only Joshua Tate, one of three former football players accused of sexually assaulting a female midshipman in 2012, will face court-martial; charges were never brought against the third.

headline.main: Sexual Assault Charges Dropped at Annapolis
headline.print_headline: Sex Assault Charges Dropped at Annapolis

docs.snippet: The police said an off-duty correction officer shot Jeffrey Ragland, 50, once in the chest, following a dispute involving a woman, who is also a correction officer....
docs.lead_paragraph: The police said an off-duty correction officer shot Jeffrey Ragland, 50, once in the chest, following a dispute involving a woman, who is also a correction officer.
docs.abstract: New York City Police Dept officials report that Jeffrey Ragland, retired New York City Correction Department officer, was shot and killed by another correction officer in Queens after an off-duty dispute involving a woman, who was also a correction officer; no charges have been filed.

headline.main: Retired Correction Officer’s Death May Have Stemmed From a Romantic Quarrel
headline.print_headline: Retired Correction Officer’s Death May Have Stemmed From a Romantic Quarrel

docs.snippet: O.J. Simpson's lawyers have been given until mid-April to file their written Nevada Supreme Court appeal for a new trial for the former football star in his Las Vegas armed robbery case, Simpson attorney Patricia Palm said this week....

headline.main: OJ Simpson Appeal to Nevada Court Due in April

docs.snippet: How did our Thanksgiving photo end up on a 15-foot ad in the Amazon?...
docs.lead_paragraph: How did our Thanksgiving photo end up on a 15-foot ad in the Amazon?
docs.abstract: Seth Kugel Dispatch column describes his surprise at being informed that a picture of his family is being used by a Brazilian loan business for a billboard advertising its services in city of Boa Vista; details his investigation into how it occurred; notes that he wants the billboard to stay there forever.

headline.main: The Kugel Family: Big in Brazil
headline.print_headline: The Kugel Family: Big in Brazil
